roleset.name: dance ballet
roleset.note: BALLET-N NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01. Comparison to verb entry waltz.01. No VN or FN entries. (from ballet.01-n)

role.descr: explicit mention of dance itself (rare, impossible?)

example.name: Light Verb Construction
example.text: People who-3 *T*-3 do ballet have it drilled into them, to the point where I find it more comfortable now.
